name: Maximum Speed Racing
description:
Burning tires on many different tracks and car classes!
Compete in the Championship race, overtaking and knocking out your opponents from the racing track, but be careful, because your car can blow up too.

Enjoy a new world of racing!

Features:
- Highly 16 cars
- 4 tracks
- Real car's physics
- Real AI

Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new games and updates
https://www.facebook.com/smartmovegames
